title: [Large-Scale] Blended Learning-Based Instructional Design for AIDS Prevention Education Targeting Adolescents

context.prior_knowledge: No foundational knowledge of AIDS prevention
context.additional_context: Conducted in an online LMS environment using digital devices, with project-based assessments measuring learning outcomes. Learners are professionals (medical/legal/technical) but have beginner-level knowledge in AIDS prevention education.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain the transmission routes and prevention methods of AIDS.
Learners can establish and implement an AIDS prevention action plan through blended learning.
Learners can creatively develop AIDS prevention educational content through project-based assessment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
